title: In general, 5 categories of data are gathered: • Demography: total and <5yrs population, new arrivals and departures; (source: UN agencies, community leaders, home-visitors, rapid household sample surveys). • Mortality: crude and <5yrs mortality rates, cause specific mortality rates; (source: grave counts, hospitals, home-visitors, community leaders). • Morbidity: disease incidence and attack rates (per 1000/wk
